common.title: gdxsv
home.revive.title: GundamDX BACK ONLINE!
home.revive.description: gdxsv is the project to revive online battle of "Mobile Suit Gundam: Federation vs. Zeon DX"
home.dreamcast.title: Dreamcast Version
home.dreamcast.description: We focus on DC ver.{br} The DC version has some difference from the arcade version, but it will be enjoyable for AC players.
home.dreamcast.caption: 『機動戦士ガンダム 連邦vs.ジオン & DX』{br}©創通エージェンシー・サンライズ ©BANDAI 2001{br}©CAPCOM CO.,LTD. 2001 ALL RIGHTS RESERVED
home.flycast.title: Powered by flycast
home.flycast.description: DC version of GundamDX runs on the DC Emulator {flycastGithub}. {br} gdxsv applied some patches and optimized for online battle.
home.server.title: Cloud Servers
home.server.description: We have prepared battle servers all over the world. {br} Best server is automatically picked for you and your opponent.
home.free.title: Completely FREE
home.free.description: gdxsv is developed and operated by volunteers.{br} No dial-up billing. {br} All you have to do is prepare PC and the game software.
home.voice-chat.title: Voice Chat
home.voice-chat.description: Discord server is available. {br}You can use text chat to recruit opponents, or use voice chat to talk to your allies and opponents while playing. You can also join the call on your smartphone.
